text: We like everything modern, but maybe a mix of modern and traditional. We live in a newer home, house, with a lot of open spaces. We have an open floor plan downstairs, not a lot of walls, high ceilings. We really like a clean, modern look. Something that may be timeless, that will stand the test of time.
